title: mvn wrapper not updated with quarkus update

labels.name: area/upgradetool
labels.description: issues related to upgrade tooling (openrewrite, windup, cli, etc.)

body:
### Describe the bug

we currently dont update the maven wrapper when updating causing that the new migrated project cannot build if users starts from older quarkus with non updated wrapper

### Expected behavior

do the wrapper update or at least inform the user

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_
